meanings.sent1: She rechanges her outfit multiple times before deciding on one.
meanings.sent2: He always rechanges his mind about what movie to watch.
meanings.sent3: The cat rechanges its sleeping spot every night, keeping us entertained.
meanings.sent4: The weather rechanges its mood from sunny to rainy in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The chameleon rechanges its color to blend in with its surroundings.

meanings.definition: To exchange something for something else.
meanings.sent1: They rechanges their toys with each other to play with something new.
meanings.sent2: The siblings often rechanges snacks at lunchtime.
meanings.sent3: The students rechanges books to read different stories during break time.
meanings.sent4: The birds rechanges their nesting materials for stronger ones.
meanings.sent5: The friends rechanges gifts during the holiday season.

meanings.sent1: The mechanic rechanges the old battery with a new one in the car.
meanings.sent2: She rechanges the broken light bulb in the hallway.
meanings.sent3: The chef rechanges the missing ingredient with a similar one in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The teacher rechanges the lost pencil with a spare one for the student.
meanings.sent5: The gardener rechanges the wilted flowers with fresh blooms in the garden.
